title: 3 Inexpensive Cryptos Poised for 10x Gains in 2024
description: Discover the top three underrated cryptocurrencies predicted to achieve 10x growth by 2024. Learn about the optimistic outlook for Bitcoin, the significance of stablecoin market recovery, and why tokens like Aptos (APT), Mantle (MNT), and Arbitrum (ARB) are considered high-growth opportunities in the evolving crypto landscape. Dive into the detailed analysis of each token's potential, market dynamics, and how upcoming events like Bitcoin's halving and ETF launches could fuel the next bull market.

title: JPMorgan: 78% of Institutional Traders Surveyed Have No Plans to Trade Crypto
description: Global investment bank JPMorgan conducted a survey of over 4,000 institutional traders and found that 78% of them have no plans to trade crypto or digital coins, while 12% do. In addition, 61% of traders “predict artificial intelligence/machine learning as the most influential in shaping the future of trading over the next three years.” JPMorgan’s […]

title: Potential exodus rattles SEC’s crypto unit amid regulatory turmoil
description: Amidst a wave of uncertainty, the US Securities and Exchange Commission’s (SEC) crypto assets and cyber unit finds itself in the spotlight as reports of senior lawyers considering departures cast a shadow over the agency’s regulatory efforts in cryptocurrency. Reports of turmoil within SEC’s crypto unit Fox Business journalist Charles Gasparino broke the news, citing […]

title: dYdX Foundation secures $30M in funding from community treasury for ecosystem growth
description: The dYdX Foundation has successfully secured $30 million in DYDX tokens from its community treasury. This funding initiative received overwhelming support from the dYdX Chain community, with 98% voting in favor of the Foundation Fundraise proposal. The participation rate for this vote was notably high at 86.4%, showcasing the community’s strong backing for the Foundation’s […]

title: Hong Kong authorities issue warning on suspected crypto fraud involving MEXC Exchange
description: Hong Kong’s Securities and Futures Commission (SFC) and law enforcement have raised alarm over a suspected fraudulent scheme tied to a virtual asset trading platform called MEXC. The warning follows recent regulatory reminders urging crypto exchanges to obtain licenses under the city’s virtual asset regulations or face potential bans. Suspected fraud unveiled The SFC and […]

title: Israel Deploys New Military AI in Gaza Conflict
description: Israel’s military has deployed AI-enabled technology in combat operations for the first time during the recent conflict in Gaza, sparking concerns about the increasing use of autonomous weapons in contemporary warfare. Spokesperson Daniel Hagari indicated the broad scope of the technology’s application, stating that Israeli forces were simultaneously operating “above and underground.” A senior defense […]

title: Terra classic (LUNC) poised for rally amid market recovery
description: Amidst the broader market recovery in the cryptocurrency space, altcoins like Terra Classic (LUNC) have captured the attention of analysts due to their robust fundamentals. Analysts highlight LUNC’s resilience and potential for a significant price surge, attributing it to various factors, including community strength and support from major exchanges like Binance. title: Solana finds resistance at $100; Rebel Satoshi posts sharp growth in presale
description: Solana (SOL) and Rebel Satoshi (RBLZ) are on investors' radar. While SOL is volatile, RBLZ has been edging higher

title: Mollars Initial Coin Offering Nears $600K In Token Presales
description: A Bitcoin alternative for the Ethereum  Blockchain will be live on crypto exchanges by May 2024.   It’s become quite the buzz among cryptocurrency investors.    With the Initial Coin offering [ICO] nearing US$600,000 in funds raised, it could launch even sooner.
